name: jsonm
description: json compressor for packing messages with memoization

scripts.browserify: npm run build && browserify -s packer build/node/packer.js -o build/packer.js && browserify -s unpacker build/node/unpacker.js -o build/unpacker.js && node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js -s jsonm build/node/index.js -o build/jsonm.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run flow && npm run test && npm run browserify
scripts.build: babel src --out-dir build/node && flow-copy-source src build

author: Lennart Kats <postcards add lennart.cl>
